			<li id="ca-more-view" class="selected vector-more-collapsible-item mw-list-item"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lukas_Podolski"><span>Read</span></a></li><li id="ca-more-edit" class="vector-more-collapsible-item mw-list-item"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Lukas_Podolski&amp;action=edit" title="Edit this page [ctrl-option-e]" accesskey="e"><span>Edit</span></a></li><li id="ca-more-history" class="vector-more-collapsible-item mw-list-item"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Lukas_Podolski&amp;action=history"><span>View history</span></a></li>

	</div>

					<div id="mw-content-text" class="mw-body-content"><div class="mw-content-ltr mw-parser-output" lang="en" dir="ltr"><div class="shortdescription nomobile noexcerpt noprint searchaux" style="display:none">Footballer (born 1985)</div>
<style data-mw-deduplicate="TemplateStyles:r1236090951">.mw-parser-output .hatnote{font-style:italic}.mw-parser-output div.hatnote{padding-left:1.6em;margin-bottom:0.5em}.mw-parser-output .hatnote i{font-style:normal}.mw-parser-output .hatnote+link+.hatnote{margin-top:-0.5em}@media print{body.ns-0 .mw-parser-output .hatnote{display:none!important}}</style><div role="note" class="hatnote navigation-not-searchable">"Łukasz Podolski" redirects here. For the cyclist, see <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/%C5%81ukasz_Podolski_(cyclist)" title="Łukasz Podolski (cyclist)">Łukasz Podolski (cyclist)</a>.</div>
<p class="mw-empty-elt">
</p>
<style data-mw-deduplicate="TemplateStyles:r1289430074">.mw-parser-output .infobox-subbox{padding:0;border:none;margin:-3px;width:auto;min-width:100%;font-size:100%;clear:none;float:none;background-color:transparent}.mw-parser-output .infobox-3cols-child{margin:auto}.mw-parser-output .infobox .navbar{font-size:100%}@media screen{html.skin-theme-clientpref-night .mw-parser-output .infobox-full-data:not(.notheme)>div:not(.notheme)[style]{background:#1f1f23!important;color:#f8f9fa}}@media screen and (prefers-color-scheme:dark){html.skin-theme-clientpref-os .mw-parser-output .infobox-full-data:not(.notheme) div:not(.notheme){background:#1f1f23!important;color:#f8f9fa}}@media(min-width:640px){body.skin--responsive .mw-parser-output .infobox-table{display:table!important}body.skin--responsive .mw-parser-output .infobox-table>caption{display:table-caption!important}body.skin--responsive .mw-parser-output .infobox-table>tbody{display:table-row-group}body.skin--responsive .mw-parser-output .infobox-table th,body.skin--responsive .mw-parser-output .infobox-table td{padding-left:inherit;padding-right:inherit}}</style><table class="infobox infobox-table vcard" style="line-height: 1.2em; max-width: 420px !important;"><caption class="infobox-title fn" style="line-height: 1.2em; font-size: 125%">Lukas Podolski</caption><tbody><tr><td colspan="4" class="infobox-image">
<span class="mw-default-size" typeof="mw:File/Frameless"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/File:Lukas_Podolski_2023.jpg" class="mw-file-description"><img src="./Lukas Podolski - Wikipedia_files/Lukas_Podolski_2023.jpg" decoding="async" width="250" height="375" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/7d/Lukas_Podolski_2023.jpg/500px-Lukas_Podolski_2023.jpg 1.5x" data-file-width="1280" data-file-height="1920"></a></span><div class="infobox-caption" style="padding:0.2em 0 0 0;">Podolski playing for <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/G%C3%B3rnik_Zabrze" title="Górnik Zabrze">Górnik Zabrze</a> in 2023</div></td></tr><tr><th colspan="4" class="infobox-header" style="color: #202122;background-color: #b0c4de; line-height: 1.5em">Personal information</th></tr><tr><th scope="row" class="infobox-label" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline; text-align: left">Full name</th><td colspan="3" class="infobox-data nickname" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline;;white-space: normal;">
Lukas Josef Podolski<sup id="cite_ref-1" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lukas_Podolski#cite_note-1"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" class="infobox-label" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline; text-align: left">Birth name</th><td colspan="3" class="infobox-data nickname" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline;;white-space: normal;">
Łukasz Józef Podolski<sup id="cite_ref-2" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lukas_Podolski#cite_note-2"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>2<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" class="infobox-label" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline; text-align: left">Date of birth</th><td colspan="3" class="infobox-data" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline;;white-space: normal;">
<span style="display:none"> (<span class="bday">1985-06-04</span>) </span>4 June 1985<span class="noprint ForceAgeToShow"> (age&nbsp;39)</span><sup id="cite_ref-3" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lukas_Podolski#cite_note-3"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>3<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" class="infobox-label" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline; text-align: left">Place of birth</th><td colspan="3" class="infobox-data birthplace" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline;;white-space: normal;">
<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gliwice" title="Gliwice">Gliwice</a>, Poland</td></tr><tr><th scope="row" class="infobox-label" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline; text-align: left">Height</th><td colspan="3" class="infobox-data" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline;;white-space: normal;">
1.83&nbsp;m (6&nbsp;ft 0&nbsp;in)<sup id="cite_ref-4" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lukas_Podolski#cite_note-4"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>4<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" class="infobox-label" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline; text-align: left">Position(s)</th><td colspan="3" class="infobox-data role" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline;;white-space: normal;">
<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Forward_(association_football)" title="Forward (association football)">Forward</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Attacking_midfielder" class="mw-redirect" title="Attacking midfielder">attacking midfielder</a><sup id="cite_ref-PodolskiArsenalProfile_5-0" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lukas_Podolski#cite_note-PodolskiArsenalProfile-5"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>5<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></td></tr><tr><th colspan="4" class="infobox-header" style="color: #202122;background-color: #b0c4de; line-height: 1.5em">Team information</th></tr><tr><th scope="row" class="infobox-label" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline; text-align: left"><div style="display: inline-block; line-height: 1.2em; padding: .1em 0;">Current team</div></th><td colspan="3" class="infobox-data org" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline;;white-space: normal;">

2</td><td class="infobox-data infobox-data-c" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline; text-align: right">
(0)</td></tr><tr><th scope="row" class="infobox-label" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline; text-align: left"><span style="font-weight:normal">2009–2012</span></th><td class="infobox-data infobox-data-a" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline;">
<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1._FC_K%C3%B6ln" title="1. FC Köln">1. FC Köln</a></td><td class="infobox-data infobox-data-b" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline; text-align: right">
88</td><td class="infobox-data infobox-data-c" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline; text-align: right">
(33)</td></tr><tr><th scope="row" class="infobox-label" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline; text-align: left"><span style="font-weight:normal">2012–2015</span></th><td class="infobox-data infobox-data-a" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline;">
<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Arsenal_F.C." title="Arsenal F.C.">Arsenal</a></td><td class="infobox-data infobox-data-b" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline; text-align: right">
60</td><td class="infobox-data infobox-data-c" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline; text-align: right">
(19)</td></tr><tr><th scope="row" class="infobox-label" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline; text-align: left"><span style="font-weight:normal">2015</span></th><td class="infobox-data infobox-data-a" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline;">
→ <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Inter_Milan" title="Inter Milan">Inter Milan</a> (loan)</td><td class="infobox-data infobox-data-b" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline; text-align: right">

<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vissel_Kobe" title="Vissel Kobe">Vissel Kobe</a></td><td class="infobox-data infobox-data-b" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline; text-align: right">

<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Antalyaspor" title="Antalyaspor">Antalyaspor</a></td><td class="infobox-data infobox-data-b" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline; text-align: right">
40</td><td class="infobox-data infobox-data-c" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline; text-align: right">

<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/G%C3%B3rnik_Zabrze" title="Górnik Zabrze">Górnik Zabrze</a></td><td class="infobox-data infobox-data-b" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline; text-align: right">
100</td><td class="infobox-data infobox-data-c" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline; text-align: right">
(23)</td></tr><tr><th colspan="4" class="infobox-header" style="color: #202122;background-color: #b0c4de; line-height: 1.5em">International career</th></tr><tr><th scope="row" class="infobox-label" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline; text-align: left"><span style="font-weight:normal">2001–2002</span></th><td class="infobox-data infobox-data-a" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline;">
<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Germany_national_youth_football_team" title="Germany national youth football team">Germany U17</a></td><td class="infobox-data infobox-data-b" style="white-space: nowrap; vertical-align: baseline; text-align: right">
