<div class="mw-heading mw-heading2"><h2 id="Honours">Honours</h2><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Lukas_Podolski&amp;action=edit&amp;section=27" title="Edit section: Honours"><span>edit</span></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></div>
<p><b>1. FC Köln</b>
</p>
<ul><li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2._Bundesliga" title="2. Bundesliga">2. Bundesliga</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2004%E2%80%9305_2._Bundesliga" title="2004–05 2. Bundesliga">2004–05</a><sup id="cite_ref-Soccerway_86-1" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lukas_Podolski#cite_note-Soccerway-86"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>86<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li></ul>
<p><b>Bayern Munich</b><sup id="cite_ref-Soccerway_86-2" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lukas_Podolski#cite_note-Soccerway-86"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>86<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<ul><li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bundesliga" title="Bundesliga">Bundesliga</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2007%E2%80%9308_Bundesliga" title="2007–08 Bundesliga">2007–08</a></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/DFB-Pokal" title="DFB-Pokal">DFB-Pokal</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2007%E2%80%9308_DFB-Pokal" title="2007–08 DFB-Pokal">2007–08</a></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/DFL-Ligapokal" title="DFL-Ligapokal">DFL-Ligapokal</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2007_DFL-Ligapokal" title="2007 DFL-Ligapokal">2007</a></li></ul>
<p><b>Arsenal</b><sup id="cite_ref-Soccerway_86-3" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lukas_Podolski#cite_note-Soccerway-86"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>86<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<ul><li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/FA_Cup" title="FA Cup">FA Cup</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2013%E2%80%9314_FA_Cup" title="2013–14 FA Cup">2013–14</a></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/FA_Community_Shield" title="FA Community Shield">FA Community Shield</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2014_FA_Community_Shield" title="2014 FA Community Shield">2014</a></li></ul>
<p><b>Galatasaray</b><sup id="cite_ref-Soccerway_86-4" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lukas_Podolski#cite_note-Soccerway-86"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>86<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<ul><li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Turkish_Cup" title="Turkish Cup">Turkish Cup</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2015%E2%80%9316_Turkish_Cup" title="2015–16 Turkish Cup">2015–16</a></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Turkish_Super_Cup" title="Turkish Super Cup">Turkish Super Cup</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2015_Turkish_Super_Cup" title="2015 Turkish Super Cup">2015</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2016_Turkish_Super_Cup" title="2016 Turkish Super Cup">2016</a></li></ul>
<p><b>Vissel Kobe</b>
</p>
<ul><li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Emperor%27s_Cup" title="Emperor&#39;s Cup">Emperor's Cup</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2019_Emperor%27s_Cup" title="2019 Emperor&#39;s Cup">2019</a><sup id="cite_ref-EmperorsCup_64-1" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lukas_Podolski#cite_note-EmperorsCup-64"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>64<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li></ul>
<p><b>Germany</b><sup id="cite_ref-Soccerway_86-5" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lukas_Podolski#cite_note-Soccerway-86"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>86<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<ul><li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/FIFA_World_Cup" title="FIFA World Cup">FIFA World Cup</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2014_FIFA_World_Cup" title="2014 FIFA World Cup">2014</a>; third place: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2006_FIFA_World_Cup" title="2006 FIFA World Cup">2006</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2010_FIFA_World_Cup" title="2010 FIFA World Cup">2010</a></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/UEFA_European_Championship" title="UEFA European Championship">UEFA European Championship</a>: runner-up <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2008_UEFA_European_Championship" class="mw-redirect" title="2008 UEFA European Championship">2008</a><sup id="cite_ref-131" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lukas_Podolski#cite_note-131"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>125<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/FIFA_Confederations_Cup" title="FIFA Confederations Cup">FIFA Confederations Cup</a> third place: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2005_FIFA_Confederations_Cup" title="2005 FIFA Confederations Cup">2005</a></li></ul>
<p><b>Individual</b>
</p>
<ul><li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_2._Bundesliga_top_scorers" title="List of 2. Bundesliga top scorers">2.Bundesliga Top scorer</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2004%E2%80%9305_2._Bundesliga" title="2004–05 2. Bundesliga">2004–05</a></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/FIFA_World_Cup_awards#FIFA_Young_Player_Award" title="FIFA World Cup awards">FIFA World Cup Best Young Player</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2006_FIFA_World_Cup" title="2006 FIFA World Cup">2006</a><sup id="cite_ref-podolski_132-0" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lukas_Podolski#cite_note-podolski-132"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>126<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Silbernes_Lorbeerblatt" title="Silbernes Lorbeerblatt">Silbernes Lorbeerblatt</a>: 2006, 2010,<sup id="cite_ref-133" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lukas_Podolski#cite_note-133"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>127<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> 2014<sup id="cite_ref-134" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lukas_Podolski#cite_note-134"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>128<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li>Silver Shoe: Euro 2008<sup id="cite_ref-135" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lukas_Podolski#cite_note-135"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>129<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/UEFA_European_Championship_Teams_of_the_Tournament" class="mw-redirect" title="UEFA European Championship Teams of the Tournament">UEFA Euro Team of the Tournament</a>: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/UEFA_Euro_2008#Awards" title="UEFA Euro 2008">2008</a><sup id="cite_ref-uefaeuro2008_136-0" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lukas_Podolski#cite_note-uefaeuro2008-136"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>130<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><i><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kicker_(sports_magazine)" class="mw-redirect" title="Kicker (sports magazine)">kicker</a></i> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bundesliga" title="Bundesliga">Bundesliga</a> Team of the Season: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2010%E2%80%9311_Bundesliga" title="2010–11 Bundesliga">2010–11</a><sup id="cite_ref-137" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lukas_Podolski#cite_note-137"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>131<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Goal_of_the_Year_(Germany)" title="Goal of the Year (Germany)">Goal of the Year (Germany)</a>: 2017<sup id="cite_ref-138" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lukas_Podolski#cite_note-138"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>132<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ekstraklasa" title="Ekstraklasa">Ekstraklasa</a> Top assists provider: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2022%E2%80%9323_Ekstraklasa" title="2022–23 Ekstraklasa">2022–23</a><sup id="cite_ref-Asysty_139-0" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lukas_Podolski#cite_note-Asysty-139"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>133<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li></ul>
<div class="mw-heading mw-heading2"><h2 id="Charity_and_philanthropy">Charity and philanthropy</h2><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Lukas_Podolski&amp;action=edit&amp;section=28" title="Edit section: Charity and philanthropy"><span>edit</span></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></div>
<figure class="mw-default-size mw-halign-right" typeof="mw:File/Thumb"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/File:Lukas_Podolski_Arka_Fundacja_Dzieci_IMG_0013.jpg" class="mw-file-description"><img src="./Lukas Podolski - Wikipedia_files/Lukas_Podolski_Arka_Fundacja_Dzieci_IMG_0013.jpg" decoding="async" width="250" height="167" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/4/4b/Lukas_Podolski_Arka_Fundacja_Dzieci_IMG_0013.jpg/500px-Lukas_Podolski_Arka_Fundacja_Dzieci_IMG_0013.jpg 1.5x" data-file-width="5616" data-file-height="3744"></a><figcaption>Podolski with children from <i>Arka Fundacja Dzieci</i> in <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Warsaw" title="Warsaw">Warsaw</a>, June 2015</figcaption></figure>
<p>Podolski is the founder of the Lukas Podolski Foundation for Sport and Education (<i>Lukas Podolski Stiftung für Sport und Bildung</i>), whose objectives are to provide opportunities for socially disadvantaged children and youth, combat child poverty, and advance social inclusion, integration, and international understanding.<sup id="cite_ref-140" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lukas_Podolski#cite_note-140"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>134<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>He is also an ambassador of the Christian Children's Fund the Ark (<i>Die Arche</i>).<sup id="cite_ref-141" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lukas_Podolski#cite_note-141"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>135<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> One of his projects is a community day care centre for children located in a distressed part of <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Praga-P%C3%B3%C5%82noc" title="Praga-Północ">Praga-Północ</a> district in <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Warsaw" title="Warsaw">Warsaw</a>, Poland, opened in 2014. The facility is run by <i>Arka Fundacja Dzieci</i> sponsored by Podolski's foundation.<sup id="cite_ref-142" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lukas_Podolski#cite_note-142"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>136<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<div class="mw-heading mw-heading2"><h2 id="Personal_life">Personal life</h2><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Lukas_Podolski&amp;action=edit&amp;section=29" title="Edit section: Personal life"><span>edit</span></a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></div>
<p>Podolski was born to <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Waldemar_Podolski" title="Waldemar Podolski">Waldemar Podolski</a> and Krystyna Podolska in the <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Silesia" title="Silesia">Silesian</a> industrial city of <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gliwice" title="Gliwice">Gliwice</a> near <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Katowice" title="Katowice">Katowice</a> in Poland. Waldemar is a former footballer who played in Poland and Germany. Krystyna is a former member of the <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Poland_women%27s_national_handball_team" title="Poland women&#39;s national handball team">Poland national handball team</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-143" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lukas_Podolski#cite_note-143"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>137<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>In 1987, when Podolski was two years old, his family emigrated from Poland to <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/West_Germany" title="West Germany">West Germany</a> and were given <i><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Right_of_return" title="Right of return">Aussiedler</a></i> status as a result of his paternal grandparents having German citizenship prior to World War II (Gliwice was a <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Former_eastern_territories_of_Germany" title="Former eastern territories of Germany">part of Germany</a> until 1945 as <i>Gleiwitz</i>).<sup id="cite_ref-144" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lukas_Podolski#cite_note-144"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>138<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> Podolski grew up in <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bergheim,_North_Rhine-Westphalia" title="Bergheim, North Rhine-Westphalia">Bergheim, North Rhine-Westphalia</a>, and later in <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pulheim" title="Pulheim">Pulheim</a>, both near <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cologne" title="Cologne">Cologne</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-145" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lukas_Podolski#cite_note-145"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>139<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>Podolski possesses <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dual_citizenship" class="mw-redirect" title="Dual citizenship">dual citizenship</a>, both German and Polish, but has stated that he does not have a <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Polish_passport" title="Polish passport">Polish passport</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-keinpass_146-0" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lukas_Podolski#cite_note-keinpass-146"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>140<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-147" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lukas_Podolski#cite_note-147"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>141<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-148" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lukas_Podolski#cite_note-148"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>142<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> In an interview Podolski said that the <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Polish_Football_Association" title="Polish Football Association">Polish Football Association</a> never cared about him until he started playing for the <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Germany_national_under-21_football_team" title="Germany national under-21 football team">German under-21 team</a> and received coverage in the media. At that point, Podolski had already decided to play for Germany, but nevertheless "there are two hearts beating" in his chest.<sup id="cite_ref-keinpass_146-1" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lukas_Podolski#cite_note-keinpass-146"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>140<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> Podolski speaks Polish and sometimes communicated with <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/FC_Bayern_Munich" title="FC Bayern Munich">Bayern Munich</a> and <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Germany_national_football_team" title="Germany national football team">Germany</a> strike partner <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Miroslav_Klose" title="Miroslav Klose">Miroslav Klose</a>, also a Polish-born <i>Aussiedler</i>, in Polish to hinder their opposition's understanding of their conversation.<sup id="cite_ref-149" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lukas_Podolski#cite_note-149"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>143<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> Podolski is a fan of <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/G%C3%B3rnik_Zabrze" title="Górnik Zabrze">KS Górnik Zabrze</a>, a football team based 3 kilometres (1.9&nbsp;mi) from his place of birth.<sup id="cite_ref-150" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lukas_Podolski#cite_note-150"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>144<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>In April 2011, Podolski married his longtime girlfriend Monika Puchalski in <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cologne" title="Cologne">Cologne</a>, Germany.<sup id="cite_ref-151" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lukas_Podolski#cite_note-151"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>145<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> They had a church wedding in <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kamionna,_W%C4%99gr%C3%B3w_County" title="Kamionna, Węgrów County">Kamionna, Węgrów County</a>, Poland in June 2011.<sup id="cite_ref-152" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lukas_Podolski#cite_note-152"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>146<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> They have a son born 14 April 2008,<sup id="cite_ref-153" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lukas_Podolski#cite_note-153"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>147<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-154" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lukas_Podolski#cite_note-154"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>148<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> a daughter, born 6 June 2016,<sup id="cite_ref-155" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lukas_Podolski#cite_note-155"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>149<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> and a third child. They currently reside in Katowice, Poland, where Podolski owns an apartment in the Pierwsza Dzielnica neighborhood.<sup id="cite_ref-156" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lukas_Podolski#cite_note-156"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>150<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>Podolski owns an ice cream parlour and a <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kebab" title="Kebab">kebab</a> shop in Cologne.<sup id="cite_ref-157" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lukas_Podolski#cite_note-157"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>151<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>On 30 June 2021, Podolski was announced as a judge for the 15th season of <i><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Das_Supertalent" title="Das Supertalent">Das Supertalent</a></i>, the German version of <i><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Got_Talent" title="Got Talent">Got Talent</a></i>. He will become the first <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Association_football" title="Association football">association football</a> player to judge any version of the franchise owned by <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Simon_Cowell" title="Simon Cowell">Simon Cowell</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-158" class="reference"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lukas_Podolski#cite_note-158"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>152<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>

<li id="cite_note-Eurosport-7"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lukas_Podolski#cite_ref-Eurosport_7-0"><span class="cite-accessibility-label">Jump up to: </span><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lukas_Podolski#cite_ref-Eurosport_7-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite class="citation web cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.eurosport.com/football/lukas-podolski_prs27564/person.shtml">"Lukas Podolski: Eurosport"</a>. FIFA<span class="reference-accessdate">. Retrieved <span class="nowrap">30 April</span> 2012</span>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.btitle=Lukas+Podolski%3A+Eurosport&amp;rft.pub=FIFA&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.eurosport.com%2Ffootball%2Flukas-podolski_prs27564%2Fperson.shtml&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ALukas+Podolski" class="Z3988"></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-Goal.com-8"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lukas_Podolski#cite_ref-Goal.com_8-0" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite id="CITEREFWhitney" class="citation web cs1">Whitney, Clark. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.goal.com/en-gb/news/2601/features/2011/09/06/2652783/why-germany-owe-a-lot-to-poland-born-miroslav-klose-lukas?noBetaRedirect=1">"Why Germany owe a lot to Poland-born Miroslav Klose &amp; Lukas Podolski"</a>. <i>Goal.com</i><span class="reference-accessdate">. <li id="cite_note-73"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lukas_Podolski#cite_ref-73" aria-label="Jump up" title="Jump up">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1238218222"><cite class="citation web cs1 cs1-prop-foreign-lang-source"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.sportschau.de/newsticker/dpa-podolski-macht-weiter-zabrze-vertrag-bis-2025-verlaengert-100.html">"Podolski macht weiter: Zabrze-Vertrag bis 2025 verlängert"</a> (in German). style="display: none;"><th scope="row" class="navbox-group" style="width:1%;background:#DCDCDC;">Best Young Player</th><td class="navbox-list-with-group navbox-list navbox-odd hlist" <ul><li><span class="nowrap"><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1958_FIFA_World_Cup" title="1958 FIFA World Cup">1958</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brazil_national_football_team" title="Brazil national football team"><img alt="Brazil" src="./Lukas Podolski - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Brazil_(1889–1960).svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="11" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/92/Flag_of_Brazil_%281889%E2%80%931960%29.svg/40px-Flag_of_Brazil_%281889%E2%80%931960%29.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="1000" data-file-height="700"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pel%C3%A9" title="Pelé">Pelé</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1962_FIFA_World_Cup" title="1962 FIFA World Cup">1962</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hungary_national_football_team" title="Hungary national football team"><img alt="Hungary" src="./Lukas Podolski - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Hungary(1).svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="8" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/c/c1/Flag_of_Hungary.svg/40px-Flag_of_Hungary.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="1200" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fl%C3%B3ri%C3%A1n_Albert" title="Flórián Albert">Albert</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1966_FIFA_World_Cup" title="1966 FIFA World Cup">1966</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Germany_national_football_team" title="Germany national football team"><img alt="West Germany" src="./Lukas Podolski - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Germany(2).svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="9" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/ba/Flag_of_Germany.svg/40px-Flag_of_Germany.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="1000" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Franz_Beckenbauer" title="Franz Beckenbauer">Beckenbauer</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1970_FIFA_World_Cup" title="1970 FIFA World Cup">1970</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Peru_national_football_team" title="Peru national football team"><img alt="Peru" src="./Lukas Podolski - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Peru.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/c/cf/Flag_of_Peru.svg/40px-Flag_of_Peru.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Te%C3%B3filo_Cubillas" title="Teófilo Cubillas">Cubillas</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1974_FIFA_World_Cup" title="1974 FIFA World Cup">1974</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Poland_national_football_team" title="Poland national football team"><img alt="Poland" src="./Lukas Podolski - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Poland(1).svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="9" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/1/12/Flag_of_Poland.svg/40px-Flag_of_Poland.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="1280" data-file-height="800"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/W%C5%82adys%C5%82aw_%C5%BBmuda" title="Władysław Żmuda">Żmuda</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1978_FIFA_World_Cup" title="1978 FIFA World Cup">1978</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Italy_national_football_team" title="Italy national football team"><img alt="Italy" src="./Lukas Podolski - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Italy.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/03/Flag_of_Italy.svg/40px-Flag_of_Italy.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="1500" data-file-height="1000"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Antonio_Cabrini" title="Antonio Cabrini">Cabrini</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1982_FIFA_World_Cup" title="1982 FIFA World Cup">1982</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/France_national_football_team" title="France national football team"><img alt="France" src="./Lukas Podolski - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_France.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/c/c3/Flag_of_France.svg/40px-Flag_of_France.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Manuel_Amoros" title="Manuel Amoros">Amoros</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1986_FIFA_World_Cup" title="1986 FIFA World Cup">1986</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Belgium_national_football_team" title="Belgium national football team"><img alt="Belgium" src="./Lukas Podolski - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Belgium_(civil).svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/92/Flag_of_Belgium_%28civil%29.svg/40px-Flag_of_Belgium_%28civil%29.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Enzo_Scifo" title="Enzo Scifo">Scifo</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1990_FIFA_World_Cup" title="1990 FIFA World Cup">1990</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yugoslavia_national_football_team" title="Yugoslavia national football team"><img alt="Socialist Federal Republic of Yugoslavia" src="./Lukas Podolski - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Yugoslavia_(1946-1992).svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="8" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/61/Flag_of_Yugoslavia_%281946-1992%29.svg/40px-Flag_of_Yugoslavia_%281946-1992%29.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="1000" data-file-height="500"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_Prosine%C4%8Dki" title="Robert Prosinečki">Prosinečki</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1994_FIFA_World_Cup" title="1994 FIFA World Cup">1994</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Netherlands_national_football_team" title="Netherlands national football team"><img alt="Netherlands" src="./Lukas Podolski - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/20/Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg/40px-Flag_of_the_Netherlands.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Marc_Overmars" title="Marc Overmars">Overmars</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1998_FIFA_World_Cup" title="1998 FIFA World Cup">1998</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/England_national_football_team" title="England national football team"><img alt="England" src="./Lukas Podolski - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_England(1).svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="9" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/be/Flag_of_England.svg/40px-Flag_of_England.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="800" data-file-height="480"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Michael_Owen" title="Michael Owen">Owen</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2002_FIFA_World_Cup" title="2002 FIFA World Cup">2002</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/United_States_men%27s_national_soccer_team" title="United States men&#39;s national soccer team"><img alt="United States" src="./Lukas Podolski - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_the_United_States.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="8" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/a/a4/Flag_of_the_United_States.svg/40px-Flag_of_the_United_States.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="1235" data-file-height="650"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Landon_Donovan" title="Landon Donovan">Donovan</a></span></li></ul>
</div></td></tr><tr style="display: none;"><th scope="row" class="navbox-group" style="width:1%;background:#DCDCDC;">FIFA Young Player Award</th><td class="navbox-list-with-group navbox-list navbox-even hlist" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em">
<ul><li><span class="nowrap"><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2006_FIFA_World_Cup" title="2006 FIFA World Cup">2006</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Germany_national_football_team" title="Germany national football team"><img alt="Germany" src="./Lukas Podolski - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Germany(2).svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="9" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/ba/Flag_of_Germany.svg/40px-Flag_of_Germany.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="1000" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Podolski</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2010_FIFA_World_Cup" title="2010 FIFA World Cup">2010</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Germany_national_football_team" title="Germany national football team"><img alt="Germany" src="./Lukas Podolski - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Germany(2).svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="9" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/b/ba/Flag_of_Germany.svg/40px-Flag_of_Germany.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="1000" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Thomas_M%C3%BCller" title="Thomas Müller">Müller</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2014_FIFA_World_Cup" title="2014 FIFA World Cup">2014</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/France_national_football_team" title="France national football team"><img alt="France" src="./Lukas Podolski - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_France.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/c/c3/Flag_of_France.svg/40px-Flag_of_France.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paul_Pogba" title="Paul Pogba">Pogba</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2018_FIFA_World_Cup" title="2018 FIFA World Cup">2018</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/France_national_football_team" title="France national football team"><img alt="France" src="./Lukas Podolski - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_France.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="10" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/c/c3/Flag_of_France.svg/40px-Flag_of_France.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="900" data-file-height="600"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kylian_Mbapp%C3%A9" title="Kylian Mbappé">Mbappé</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2022_FIFA_World_Cup" title="2022 FIFA World Cup">2022</a>:</b> <span class="flagicon"><span class="mw-image-border" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Argentina_national_football_team" title="Argentina national football team"><img alt="Argentina" src="./Lukas Podolski - Wikipedia_files/Flag_of_Argentina.svg.png" decoding="async" width="15" height="9" class="mw-file-element" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/1a/Flag_of_Argentina.svg/40px-Flag_of_Argentina.svg.png 1.5x" data-file-width="800" data-file-height="500"></a></span></span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Enzo_Fern%C3%A1ndez" title="Enzo Fernández">Fernández</a></span></li></ul>
</div></td></tr><tr style="display: none;"><td class="navbox-abovebelow" colspan="2" style="background:#DCDCDC;"><div><b>FIFA Young Player Award was first awarded in <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2006_FIFA_World_Cup" title="2006 FIFA World Cup">2006</a>.</b></div></td></tr></tbody></table></div>

Bundesliga Süd (1974–1981)">2. Bundesliga South</a></th><td class="navbox-list-with-group navbox-list navbox-even hlist" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em">

</div></td></tr><tr style="display: none;"><th scope="row" class="navbox-group" style="background:gold;width:1%">2. Bundesliga</th><td class="navbox-list-with-group navbox-list navbox-odd hlist" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em">
<ul><li><span class="nowrap">1982: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rudi_V%C3%B6ller" title="Rudi Völler">Völler</a></span></li>

<li><span class="nowrap">1997: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Angelo_Vier" title="Angelo Vier">Vier</a></span></li>

<li><span class="nowrap">2001: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Olivier_Djappa" title="Olivier Djappa">Djappa</a> &amp; <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Artur_Wichniarek" title="Artur Wichniarek">Wichniarek</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2002: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Artur_Wichniarek" title="Artur Wichniarek">Wichniarek</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2003: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Andriy_Voronin" title="Andriy Voronin">Voronin</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2004: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Francisco_Copado" title="Francisco Copado">Copado</a>  &amp; <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Marek_Mint%C3%A1l" title="Marek Mintál">Mintál</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2005: <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Podolski</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2006: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Christian_Eigler" title="Christian Eigler">Eigler</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2007: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Giovanni_Federico" title="Giovanni Federico">Federico</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2008: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Milivoje_Novakovi%C4%87" title="Milivoje Novaković">Novaković</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2009: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Benjamin_Auer" title="Benjamin Auer">Auer</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/C%C3%A9dric_Makiadi" title="Cédric Makiadi">Makiadi</a> &amp; <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Marek_Mint%C3%A1l" title="Marek Mintál">Mintál</a> </span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2010: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Michael_Thurk" title="Michael Thurk">Thurk</a> </span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2011: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nils_Petersen" title="Nils Petersen">Petersen</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2012: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alexander_Meier" title="Alexander Meier">Meier</a>, <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Olivier_Occ%C3%A9an" title="Olivier Occéan">Occéan</a> &amp; <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nick_Proschwitz" title="Nick Proschwitz">Proschwitz</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2013: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Domi_Kumbela" title="Domi Kumbela">Kumbela</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2014: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mahir_Sa%C4%9Fl%C4%B1k" title="Mahir Sağlık">Sağlık</a> &amp; <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jakub_Sylvestr" title="Jakub Sylvestr">Sylvestr</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2015: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rouwen_Hennings" title="Rouwen Hennings">Hennings</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2016: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Simon_Terodde" title="Simon Terodde">Terodde</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">2017: <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Simon_Terodde" title="Simon Terodde">Terodde</a></span></li>
